title: SPOILER: Masked Singer Australia 'Spider' Paulini accidentally reveals the identity of 'Monster'
text:
Producers of The Masked Singer Australia enlisted an unprecedented amount of security to ensure the identity of their 12 competitors weren't leaked before their official reveals.

But on Wednesday, recently unmasked 'Spider' star Paulini Curuenavuli was tricked into confirming who the Monster was ahead of the grand finale.

Appearing on Newcastle's Hit106.9, the former Australian Idol star casually exposed who the remaining female celebrity was - and the judges have guessed her before.

Scroll down for video

SPOILER ALERT: Masked Singer Australia 'Spider' Paulini accidentally revealed the identity of the 'Monster' during a radio interview on Wednesday

The Project's Gorgi Coghlan has long been rumoured to be the mystery singer under the pink Monster costume, and radio host Nick Gil tricked Paulini into weighing in on the speculation.

He cleverly asked the former Young Divas star: 'I couldn’t believe that Gorgi Coghlan could sing. Could you believe that?'

Paulini reacted without thinking, confidently saying: 'I couldn’t either, I think that’s amazing! I was actually blown away by a few of the celebs on the show.'

'You never know some of these celebs have these different talents. It’s amazing,' she continued, not realising the spoiler she had revealed.

'You never know some of these celebs have these different talents. It’s amazing,': The Project's Gorgi Coghlan, right, has long been rumoured to be the mystery singer under the pink Monster costume, and radio host Nick Gil tricked Paulini into weighing in on the speculation

THE ' MONSTER' CLUES

The Monster was first introduced as someone who loves horses and spent time 'in the lab'. Gorgi is trained in equestrian and was once a biology teacher.

She admitted 'I’m a little bit country and a little bit glam'. This likely refers to Gorgi working in Melbourne on The Project, while living in Ballarat, Victoria.

Another clue that hints at her involvement as a panelist on Channel 10's program is: 'Hear my words drifting on the air... I am more than the voice behind the panel.'

The number 31 is said to be 'a game changer' for the star in another clue. Gorgi began her TV career on Melbourne's community station, Channel 31.

Multiple clues have also hinted at a connection to Shania Twain, including sheet music and a leopard-print costume from the singer's iconic That Don't Impress Me Much music video. Interestingly, Gorgi has previously confessed to being part of a Shania Twain Tribute show.

The latest clue is that the monster 'once sang in the middle of the MCG for the AFL grand final'. At 2003's AFL Grand Final, Gorgi performed before the game with Christine Anu, and the finalists from the first season of Australian Idol.

Wild guess? Multiple clues have hinted at a connection to Shania Twain. Interestingly, Gorgi has previously confessed to being part of a Shania Twain Tribute show

Who are they? Most fans are convinced Wolf is Rob Mills, while all clues for Robot appear to point towards Cody Simpson

There are only three stars left to be unmasked on the show: Monster, Robot and Wolf.

Most fans are convinced Wolf is Rob Mills, while all clues for Robot appear to point towards Cody Simpson.

The Masked Singer Australia finale airs next Monday from 7.30pm on Channel 10
description: The Masked Singer Australia has had an unprecedented amount of security to ensure the identity of its 12 competitors weren't leaked before their official reveals.
authors: Candice Jackson For Daily Mail Australia
